add_library(restricted-aws-aws-c-s3)
target_compile_options(restricted-aws-aws-c-s3 PRIVATE

  -DAWS_CAL_USE_IMPORT_EXPORT

  -DS2N_STACKTRACE
  -DS2N___RESTRICT__SUPPORTED
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)

)
